thread.title: Guns and Gulaabs Season 2 Announcement Teaser
thread.title_full: Guns and Gulaabs Season 2 Announcement Teaser

author: Achal Modak
title: Guns and Gulaabs Season 2 Announcement Teaser
text: The makers of ‘Guns & Gulaabs’ recently announced season 2 of the comedy crime thriller show. Created by Raj and DK, the series features Rajkummar Rao, Dulquer Salmaan, [Adarsh Gourav](https://www.missmalini.com/2023/12/15/ananya-panday-siddhant-chaturvedi-adarsh-gourav-vibe-beats-kho-gaye-hum-kahan-new-song), Gulshan Devaiah, Goutam Sharma, Gourav Sharma and Sanchay Goswami. The first season of the show released on August 18, 2023 on Netflix. Here’s a teaser video of the second season of the thrilling show… Streaming platform Netflix on Thursday announced the return of Raj Nidimoru and Krishna DK’s crime comedy series ‘Guns & Gulaabs’. “Khali haath nahi, Guns & Gulaabs ka naya season leke aaye hain #GunsAndGulaabs Season 2 is coming only on Netflix!,” [Netflix](https://www.missmalini.com/2023/12/28/berlin-money-heist-prequel-release-date-cast-trailer) wrote while sharing an interesting glimpse of the second season of the show which gained wide popularity and love for its quirky dialogues and fascinating characters. ‘Guns & Gulaabs’ is set in the 90s world of crime and violence. The hindi-language television series depicts the story of love and innocence blending with romance and humor. The released date has not been revealed yet but the announcement of the second season has stirred excitement among fans of the show.
